TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeObject

Docs.summary: Represents a code expression. This is a base class for other code expression objects that is never instantiated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeExpression provides a base class for code expressions within the <xref:System.CodeDom> namespace. CodeExpression is never instantiated. Instead it provides an abstract base class for other types of code expressions.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
